name: Escape from Xpiter
description:
By exploring the vast universe beyond our planet, kids can push their imaginations, ignite their natural curiosity, and develop humility.

This game will teach your kid about space, develop their problem solving and teamwork skills altogether.

Landed on a deadly planet with a wrecked spaceship, the goal of the team is to collect the broken parts and repair the spaceship to travel back to earth!
